Description: In this two-part session, Dr. Herrera will discuss breakthroughs in precision oncology powered by Droplet Digital PCR over the last decade – highlighting the concept, workflow and performance in clinical applications. Dr. Pestano will discuss how his team at Biodesix leverages Droplet Digital PCR to develop novel blood tests to aid the diagnosis and management of lung cancer, the advantages of ddPCR technology over orthogonal technologies for circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) analysis, the exciting potential of ctDNA in early-stage settings, and how Biodesix is collaborating with academia and industry to overcome regulatory obstacles impeding the widespread clinical adoption of ctDNA testing.
